did you tell people about it let's write

did you tell people about it this is an
example of the past progressive we use a
form of be in the past was or were plus
the present participle
it ends in IMG why do we use the past
progressive well we're also referring to
a past action but now we're referring to
an action that was not finished we're
looking to the past at a specific time
but at that time the action was still
taking place it did not end so he was
working and as he was working he told
this friend and that friend and perhaps
one more friend
be careful though just because you see a
form of B and then later a word that
ends an ING doesn't mean that you have a
progressive verb let me show you an
example Eric said he told friends about
it
and people were very encouraging
encouraging they supported his work
at first glance this could look like the
past progressive we have were and then
we have ing but is that really the past
progressive no because we're describing
the people they were encouraging this
word is an adjective describing people
we actually have the simple past that's
because we cannot use the past
progressive to talk about past States
past conditions or past emotions
normally non action verbs do not appear
in progressive tenses so be careful
so the past progressive expresses
actions or events in progress at a pass
point in time they are unfinished the
emphasis is on the activity as it
occurred be sure you understand when to
use the simple past and when to use the
past progressive first non action verbs
are not usually used in the progressive
so Express past states or conditions
with the simple past second we can use
the simple past to refer to an action
that interrupted a process the process
is expressed by the past progressive as
I mentioned the past progressive uses a
past form of B plus the present
participle which is the ing form of the
verb so for example work becomes working
I was working he was working she was
working it was working you were working
we were working they were working with
negative forms and short answers we'll
just use that form of B so use a
negative form of B in the past plus the
present participle to form the negative
as in I wasn't playing we weren't
playing short answers to yes/no
questions will look like this were you
playing yes I was no it wasn't

feel the present perfect is the best
answer choice here because performing is

we need the simple past because nervous
